title: [SOLVED]820-00281 - A1707 Capacitor blown HELP
message:
HELP!!!! lol

is just a blown capacitor but since apparently the schematic and board view are not available yet, don't know which to put there :(

title: [SOLVED]820-00281 - A1707 Capacitor blown HELP
message: You prob can just pull it and be ok even tho it's good practice to replace it. I'm definitely interested in the BV and Sch too if anyone has it.

title: [SOLVED]820-00281 - A1707 Capacitor blown HELP
message: wait, you if I don't replace it, it will work fine?

title: [SOLVED]820-00281 - A1707 Capacitor blown HELP
message: Remove it to clear the short. No need to put it back. Also don't use comments, use a "reply".

title: [SOLVED]820-00281 - A1707 Capacitor blown HELP
message: Yeah what Duke said basically just remove it and see if short is gone. If the cap is one of many on the line, just that one cap missing shouldn't affect anything.
